law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 46, sec. 3, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 1, effective June 8, 2011.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/8/2011). 2011 Ky. Acts ch. 58, sec. 9, provides that KRS 324A.150 to 324A.164 shall be known as the Kentucky Appraisal Management Company Registration Act.
